water.name: Water Station
water.description: You find a place to get water that does not contain lead.

moves.get water: Nothing like a cone of bottled water!|10:40
moves.fill that hydro: A hydro is necessary and stuff. That was rejuvenating.|20:60
moves.do nothing: This isn't the Sahara I suppose

moves.get some food: You eat some nice smelling nachos.

moves.eat the bag of food: Well that was pretty tasty even though I don't like Flamin' Hot Cheetos.|10:30

green.name: Green Scene
green.description: You encounter the Green Scene, a nice place to get coffee and stuff.
